Hero.title: Bug reporting made simple
Hero.subtitle: Send bug report with technical details engineers want.

screen.title: Visual context for your issue
screen.desc: Your website's UI/UX issues need a clear visual context. Use TagBug to record your screen with annotated screenshot or video.

technicalDetails.title: Engineers need critical data to identify issues
technicalDetails.desc: System information, network request and console logs are collected with the issue. No more back and force communication between QA and engineers.

instantReplay.title: Time travel debugging
instantReplay.desc: TagBug can replay what happened in the last few minutes on your website. It's like a time machine, and you can see what happens before the bug happens.

shareWithTeam.title: Share with your team
shareWithTeam.desc: Every issue is private by default, and you can share it with invited people. TagBug also allows you create folders to manage issues.

Pricing.betaMessage: During public beta, it is <freeSpan>free</freeSpan> to use TagBug.
Pricing.feedbackMessage: We will release a paid plan soon. We would love to hear your <feedbackLink>feedback</feedbackLink>.

Login.title: Login
Login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account

otpDialog.title: Enter one-time login code
otpDialog.description: Check your inbox for the code to enter below. The code will be valid for {minutes} minutes.
otpDialog.errorMessage: The code you entered is incorrect. It may have been used already or it may have expired.

InviteByEmail.title: Invite by email
InviteByEmail.description: An email will be sent to the recipient with a link to join the team

upgradeCard.title: Upgrade to Pro
upgradeCard.description: Unlock all features and get unlimited access to our support team.

DeleteTeam.title: Delete Team
DeleteTeam.description: If you want to permanently delete this team and all of its data, you can do so below.

InviteByLink.title: Invite by link
InviteByLink.description: Anyone with the link can join the team.

changeRole.title: Change the role of {email}?
changeRole.memberDescription: Can manage issues and folders in this team.
changeRole.adminDescription: Can manage team members in this team.
